Name: Cyren-Defender-ThreatIntelligence
Author: Data443 Risk Mitigation, Inc. - support@data443.com
Description: The Cyren Defender Threat Intelligence solution polls the Cyren CCF (Common Connector Framework) threat intelligence feed and pushes STIX-formatted indicators to Microsoft Sentinel's ThreatIntelligenceIndicator table. It uses a Logic App with managed identity, PersistentToken pagination, and enforces strict cost safety parameters (count=1000, queryWindowInMin=360, 6-hour recurrence).
